channel.title: Screen Flashes and Freezes
channel.description:
I'm using my Dell Inspiron 1525 and every once in a while, pretty often now actually, the screen will flash a bunch of different colors and then it freezes and won't accept any input from me so I have to restart it.
Any tips or help? I tried google but I couldn't really think of any decent search terms..

item.title: Screen Flashes and Freezes
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Like I said on irc, try reapplying the thermal paste. You said you were having overheating problems with it

Read full topic

item.title: Screen Flashes and Freezes
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This is what happened to my Asus laptop, the video chip was fried. It works random lengths of time, then the screen flashes a bunch of different colors and it freezes up, then usually I can’t turn it on (it appears to turn on, but black screen and nothing happens) for another random length of time (a few days usually) and then it starts over.

It could be a driver problem or similar too, the way to test this would be to run Linux for awhile and see if the same thing happened.

Read full topic
